summary: When a troupe of showgirls with their impresario and press agent vacation at a Malibu Beach resort, two of them are garroted. Charlie takes on the case assisted by Number Two Son Jimmy and faithful chauffeur Birmingham Brown.
cast: Sidney Toler|Mantan Moreland|Victor Sen Yung|Tanis Chandler|Larry J. Blake|Kirk Alyn|Rita Quigley|Anne Nagel|Helen Gerald|Howard Negley|Lois Austin|Barbara Jean Wong|Minerva Urecal|Margaret Brayton|Bettie Best|Jan Bryant|Walden Boyle
title: The Trap
